chat.name: Chat Page Tour
chat.description: Learn how to use the dual-model streaming chat

steps.speech: This is the message input. Type your questions here and press Enter or click Send. You can ask anything from coding questions to creative writing.
Use the provider selector to switch between Gemini and Claude mid-conversation. Each model has different strengths — Gemini handles large contexts while Claude excels at reasoning.
Choose from multiple model variants. Flash models are faster and cheaper, while Pro and Opus models deliver higher quality responses.
The file explorer shows your project structure. Click any file to open it in the editor. You can create, rename, and delete files here.
The code editor supports syntax highlighting for many languages. Write your code here and use the AI to help with refactoring, debugging, and generating new code.
Use the AI prompt area to describe what you want to build or fix. The AI can generate entire files, refactor existing code, or explain complex logic.
Search through 33 specialized NLKE agents. Each agent is designed for specific tasks like cost analysis, knowledge curation, or adaptive reasoning.
Each agent card shows its name, description, and capabilities. Click an agent to see its details and run it with custom input.
The pipeline builder lets you chain multiple agents together into automated workflows. Connect agents in sequence for complex multi-step tasks.
Search through 53 implementation playbooks covering everything from cost optimization to oracle construction. Each playbook is a step-by-step recipe.
Click any playbook to read its full content. Playbooks include code examples, decision trees, and real-world benchmarks.
Start from a workflow template or build from scratch. Templates include error recovery, knowledge synthesis, session handoff, and multi-agent orchestration.
The visual workflow designer lets you drag and connect steps. Each step can call tools, agents, or AI models. Execute the workflow and watch results flow through the pipeline.
Choose from 57 knowledge graph databases. Each contains structured knowledge about different topics — from AI models to coding tools to NLKE methodology.
Use hybrid semantic search combining embeddings, BM25 keywords, and graph structure. This achieves 88.5 percent recall — much better than any single method alone.

The interactive graph visualization shows nodes and edges. Drag to rearrange, click nodes for details, and zoom to explore clusters. Use the analytics tab for PageRank, centrality, and community detection.
RAG Chat lets you have conversations grounded in knowledge graph data. The AI cites specific nodes and edges as sources for its answers.

experts.name: Experts Page Tour
experts.description: Build AI experts backed by knowledge graphs

steps.speech: Create a new expert by selecting a knowledge graph, defining its persona, and configuring its behavior. Experts combine structured knowledge with natural conversation.
Each expert card shows its name, knowledge graph, and specialization. Click to chat with an expert or configure its settings. Experts use a 4-weight scoring formula for retrieval.

builder.name: Studio Tour
builder.description: Generate full-stack React apps with AI

steps.speech: Describe the app you want to build in plain English. The AI generates a complete React application with components, styling, and logic.
The file panel shows all generated files. Click to view and edit any file. Use the refine mode to improve specific components.
The live preview shows your generated app running in real-time. Changes update instantly thanks to Sandpack's hot module replacement.
Browse tools by category: Code Quality, Cost Optimization, Agent Intelligence, Knowledge Graph, Generators, Reasoning, Dev Tools, Frontend, Backend, Full-Stack, and Orchestration.
Select a tool to see its parameters. Fill in the input form and click Run to execute. All tools are pure Python with zero external API costs.
Results appear in the output panel. You can copy results, try different parameters, or chain tools together for more complex analyses.

vox.name: VOX Tour
vox.description: Master the VOX voice control center

steps.speech: Choose between Gemini and Claude voice modes. Gemini provides native audio streaming via the Live API. Claude uses browser speech recognition and synthesis.
Pick from 16 Gemini voices, each with a unique personality. From Puck's lively energy to Zephyr's calm breeze, find the voice that suits you best.
Click Connect to start a voice session. Once connected, just start speaking. VOX can navigate pages, run tools, query knowledge graphs, and control the entire workspace by voice.
Configure your API keys here. You need a Gemini API key for Gemini features and an Anthropic API key for Claude features. Keys are stored locally.
Choose from 5 visual themes: Default, Deluxe CRT with scanlines, Scratch with hand-drawn style, Solarized Zen, and Sunset Warm.
